import React, { useRef, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Redirect } from 'react-router'; import { Header } from "../../common/Header"; import { MDBBtn, MDBFreeBird, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardText, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBFormInline, MDBIcon, MDBInput, MDBRow, MDBTable, MDBTableBody, MDBTableHead, MDBEdgeHeader, MDBCardTitle, MDBProgress, MDBListGroup, MDBListGroupItem, MDBBreadcrumbItem, MDBBreadcrumb, MDBCollapse, MDBNotification } from "mdbreact"; import "./style.css"; import { fetchData } from '../../services/apiConfig' export const Subdomains = (props: any) => { const [subDomains, setSubDomains] = useState(["subDomains"]); const [collapseID, setCollapseID] = useState(""); const [vulnerability, setVulnerability] = useState('all'); useEffect(() => { fetchData('subdomain', 'POST', { "domain": "delhivery.com", "accountId": "9911213560" }).then((res: any) => { console.log(res) setSubDomains(res) }) }, []); const toggleCollapse = (collapseid: any) => { console.log(collapseid) if (collapseid !== collapseID) { setCollapseID(collapseid) } else { setCollapseID("") } } const Vulnerability = (e: any) => { console.log(e.target.value) setVulnerability(e.target.value); } const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); console.log(props) console.log(subDomains) if (token === null || token === undefined || token.length < 0) { return } const dummy = ["abc", "cdf"] return ( <> props.SwitchView('domains')} color="blue-grey" style={{ border: "2px solid blue-grey", borderRadius: "5px", marginLeft: "0px !important", fontSize: "8px !important" }}> Back assets domains sub-domains
